name: Professor Moss
description: Absorbed, brilliant, and slightly gruff. Lives half in the world of lichens and half in the world of memory.
background: Gave Adam a rare Prototaxite fragment — not as a grand gesture, but because he trusted him to appreciate it.

fossil_sample.description: Professor Moss occasionally wears a fossil shard in a leather pouch. It glints oddly when it catches the light.

Adam.description: Respects Adam’s attention to detail and quiet enthusiasm for strange things.

ask_about_fossil.description: Moss mentions it’s a Prototaxite — but shrugs, saying Adam seemed like the right person to carry a piece of it.
